name: High ELB Latency for {{host.name}} - DD Example
message:
p95 latency for ELB {{host.name}} in {{host.region}} currently at {{value}} secs. Please investigate

See in Datadog [ELB Dashboard](https://app.datadoghq.com/screen/integration/80/aws-elb?tpl_var_name={{host.name}})

See in [AWS Console](https://{{host.region}}.console.aws.amazon.com/ec2/v2/home?region={{host.region}}#LoadBalancers:sort=desc:dnsName)
